name: The Sinuous Paths of Space and How to Traverse Them Using Sinuses, Cosines and Tangents v2.0
name_original: The Sinuous Paths of Space and How to Traverse Them Using Sinuses, Cosines and Tangents v2.0
description:
"The Sinuous Paths of Space and How to Traverse Them Using sinuses, cosines and tangents v2.0" is a game created in the GGJ 2017

In this game you will change the equation that defines the trajectory gectory of your jet pack. And if you do it well, you will save Red Armstrong from a hard crash against space debris and hopefully get him to his spaceship. Using the arrow keys or W, A, S or D you will change the variables and then run the "Jetpack manipulation program" by pressing SPACE.

Credits
  • Facundo Couzo (Developer)
  • Mateo de Mayo (Developer)
  • José Luna (Artist)
